author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Consider enabling TagBot to make sure the release is persistent in your repo, see https://discourse.julialang.org/t/ann-tagbot-creates-tags-and-releases-for-your-julia-packages-when-theyre-registered/23084
Thanks for the heads up.  I have a different workflow than using TagBot.  I'll make sure the tree object will not be GC'ed.
